scripts.deploy:build: echo 'Switching to build branch...' && git switch build && echo 'Merging master into build...' && git merge master && echo 'Running production build...' && npm run build && echo 'Adding built files to git...' && git add . && echo 'Committing build...' && git commit -m "build" --allow-empty && echo 'Pushing build branch to remote...' && git push && echo 'Switching back to master...' && git switch master && echo 'Running build on master (optional preview)...' && npm run build && echo 'Deployment complete!'
